channel.title: Help with mysql errors
channel.description:
Im running RSCangel source and i'm having trouble with these errors while running my server upon creating a character i cannot save profiles. When i create a character and login i get these errors and then i log out and log bak in inventory is blank and it wont save. i dont know too much bout mysql so detailed help would be greatly appreciated
ERROR:1 http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/443/error1k.png/
ERROR:2 http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/703/error2r.png/
ERROR:3 http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/547/error3r.png/
Thank you

item.title: Help with mysql errors
item.dc:creator: @th4don th4don
item.description:
@th4don wrote:

ok but how do i get rid of it… and also the other errors and main question is are these errors whats causing it not to save characters when u log out. u got msn?

Read full topic

item.title: Help with mysql errors
item.dc:creator: @tigerclan tigerclan
item.description:
@tigerclan wrote:

The first error you have is “cannot run program sudo”

Read full topic

item.title: Help with mysql errors
item.dc:creator: @th4don th4don
item.description:
@th4don wrote:

na it was the whole error i scrolled up and down before posting screen shot i just wanna find out whats causing me not to be able to save character items and profile. also it deletes items and sometimes when trying to log back in it says session killed and wont let me log back in. idk if that helps determine whats going on

Read full topic

item.title: Help with mysql errors
item.dc:creator: @tigerclan tigerclan
item.description:
@tigerclan wrote:

[quote=“th4don, post:1, topic:521654”]Im running RSCangel source and i’m having trouble with these errors while running my server upon creating a character i cannot save profiles. When i create a character and login i get these errors and then i log out and log bak in inventory is blank and it wont save. i dont know too much bout mysql so detailed help would be greatly appreciated

ERROR:1

error1k.png - Click to see more photos

Store and share all of your images @ IMAGESHACK.com

ERROR:2

ImageShack

error2r.png - Click to see more photos

Store and share all of your images @ IMAGESHACK.com

ERROR:3

ImageShack

error3r.png - Click to see more photos

Thank you[/quote]

You didn’t include the entire error for the second picture.

The first picture about “sudo” is because the program is trying to send a linux command through your command prompt

Read full topic
